name: Execute Tests
description: Run test suites and validate functionality

test_scope.description: Scope of tests to run (unit, integration, e2e, all)

target.description: Specific module or feature to test

failed_tests.description: List of failed tests with error details

instructions: Execute {test_scope} tests for {target}. Use Puppeteer for e2e tests, pytest for API tests, and vitest for frontend tests. Capture screenshots of any failures. Generate coverage report if requested.
